expo.name: best-buds-social
expo.description: Best Buds Social is a mobile app that works on phones compatible with Apple's iOS mobile operating system. It is a social app that connects New York City dog owners with other dog owners looking for a walking companion. To ensure dog walking compatibility, users have access to a swipe matching feature based on location, other dog owners' public profiles, and a chat feature where they can get to know one another.
